p: ANOSIM revealed significant differences for VOC profiles between treatments, with some overlapping between group ( R = 0.2712, p = 0.001). PERMANOVA analysis of the same dataset revealed similar outcomes for comparisons between treatments ( F = 7.3673, p = 0.001 ∗∗∗). Finally, pairwise PERMANOVA revealed significant pairwise differences between all treatments, except for the control–no injection and cinnamon–mint, as shown in Table 2.
